title: I LOVE the elitism and toxicity of this community (and how to fix it)
body:
**_RANT  ALERT_**
As a professional troll hell bent on ensuring this community remains as toxic as possible I just want to say that you all brought this apon yourselves. I was just a standard noob once, but that was an unforgivable sin. I was trolled, and now I will troll and when the games pop count dies and new player recruit falls because of the fear of the toxic hellhole this place will become I will know my job is done. 

Got chatbanned recently for flaming people who thought they could tell me how disabled I must be given my play style.  I can't flame with the chat anymore, but I can still farm other lanes, take garen support , and feed gloriously in ranked matches (go buying fake ranked accounts am I rite?) You've only slowed down the rate at which I poison this community. 


and maybe when you come back with a community moderation tool that actually gives a sense of justice instead of victimization I can tone down the salt. For real! how hard would it be just to let people know "hey, so and so who you reported was given this punishment, heres what they did, thanks for your report! have 50ip!"  

and punishments! really! delays for skipping? I just wait around playing other games or reading reddit. Chat ban? Oh no that'll stop me! Game ban? oh no I'll have to wait until tomorrow to play!  you wana hurt me? Take champions away, make me rebuy them. Take my ip, my rp, take my levels and masteires and runepages. Make me actually FEAR moderation. Then You'll actually do something to stop the salt!

replies.body: ehhh somebodies on the right track ;)
